item.title: Using Chrome Debugger Metasploit Gather Module
item.description: This last week Nick Starke got the chrome debugger metasploit module pushed over the line and merged into master. I figured I’d write up a quick intro to the module and how it might be used should you happen to stumble across a chrome debugger laying around the network.
